channel.title: Posts on Crumpled notes in the wastebasket
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Crumpled notes in the wastebasket

item.title: Awesome Setup
item.description: I use these tools and related themes/plugins on my workstations. i3 window manager stormssh ssh config manager tmux with tpm plugin manager, maglev theme, and tmuxinator for managing sessions zsh with oh-my-zsh, bullet-train theme, and various plugins (git) vim with vundle package manager, and various packages like vim-airline and powerline (see below) powerline with powerline-patched Inconsolata font I’ll publish my dotfiles soon.
